conversation.message: Hello! How can I assist you with your English learning today?
Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hello! How can I assist you today?
Can you recommend any good books or resources for learning English?

Yes, there are many great resources for learning English! Some popular books for English learners include "English Grammar in Use" by Raymond Murphy and "Word Power Made Easy" by Norman Lewis. Online resources like Duolingo, Rosetta Stone, and BBC Learning English are also helpful.
